1.「……来たか <pc>よ。| 今日は 何用じゃ？|<break>: Ah, you've come, <pc>.|What is it today?|<break>

2.「わしは ５つの理を学び| おのれを究めんとする者たちを 導く者。| 人呼んで:
I am one who learns the five principles, and|teaches those willing to learn them. I'm|what you call a Master.|
|Hmm, it seems as if you've come into|possession of a Master Orb.|
|The Master Orb is a living jewel that will|level up by receiving experience.|
|When the Master Orb levels up, it gains power|in the form of Master Points. These can help|you to become stronger.|
|However, Master Points alone are useless.|You will need something called a "jewel",|which contain various abilities.|
|Jewels can be obtained from monsters. If|you bring these jewels to me, I can unlock|their hidden abilities for you.|
|You must allocate Master Points to these|abilities in order for them to work.|
|Well, it's better to try it for yourself. I'll|unlock one jewel's ability for you. Here,|take it.

3.「何について 聞きたいのじゃ？|<break>: What would you like to ask about?|<break>

4.「達人のオーブとは おぬしが経験値を得ることで| レベルアップする 生きた宝石じ:
The Master Orb is a living jewel that will|level up by receiving experience.|
|When the Master Orb levels up, it gains power|in the form of Master Points. These can help|you to become stronger.|
|However, Master Points alone are useless.|You will need something called a jewel,|which contain various abilities.|
|If you bring these jewels to me, I can unlock|their hidden abilities for you.|
|You must allocate Master Points to these|abilities in order for them to work.|
|There are different types of Master Points|that are produced when the Master Orb levels|up in the form of elements.|
|For example, Fire Master Points can only be|used with Fire Jewels.|
|However, keep in mind that the Master Orb|level is common across all attributes.|

5.「宝珠ポイントとは 『鑑定する』で| 鑑定した宝珠の数と 同じだけ授けられる|:
Jewel Points are awarded to you equal to the|number of jewels you have appraised.|
|As a reward for finding many jewels, you can|use these points to exchange for a variety|of items.|

6.「他に 何か 聞きたいことはあるかの？|<break>: Are there any other questions you'd like to|ask?|<break>

7.「では 鑑定したい物を 選ぶがよい。|<break>: Then, choose the one you would like appraised.|<break>

8.「おぬしは 鑑定の必要な 宝珠を| 持っていないようじゃな。|<bw_break: It seems like you don't have any jewels that|can be appraised.|<bw_break>

9.「他に 用は あるかの？|<break>: Is there anything else I can do?|<break>

10.<pipipi_off>|<pc>は|炎の宝珠を 手に入れた！|<se_nots:
| received a Fire Jewel!|
||Now, you should allocate Master Points in|the "Master Orb" menu under "Misc.".|
|The amount of Master Points you can allocate|will increase as your Master Orb's level|increases.|

12.「わしは ５つの理を学び| おのれを究めんとする者たちを 導く者。| 人呼んで:
I am one who learns the five principles, and|teaches those willing to learn them. I'm|what you call a Master.|
|Hmm.. you have a good eye. You should continue|to work hard. Maybe one day, I can show you|the way.|

13.「『達人クエスト』では| 週に一度 すべての冒険者に向けて| ５つのクエストを:
With "Master Quests", adventurers will be|presented with 5 quests each week.|
|You can choose only one, so choose which|suits you best. Also, you may complete it|with companions if you so wish.|
|After completing the quest, I will give you|jewels of the attribute of your choice. I hope|that you choose to take up this challenge.|

14.今 受けている達人クエストを キャンセルして|この達人クエストを 受けますか？|: Would you like to cancel your currently|accepted Master Quest in order to accept a|new one?|<yesno 2><close>

16.「受注したクエストは 『さくせん』の| 『達人のオーブ』で いつでも確認できるぞ: You can check your accepted quest under the|"Master Orb" menu in "Misc.". When you've|completed it, you should come back to me.|<bw_break>

17.「どうやら 達人クエストを達成したようじゃな！| 見事であるぞ <pc>よ。|: It seems as if you've completed a Master|Quest! Wonderful job, <pc>. I'll give|you your reward right away.|<bw_break>

18.「おぬしは 達人クエストを受注中のようじゃな。| もし 挑戦するクエストを 変え: You seem to already have a Master Quest|accepted. If you'd like to change it, please|select a new one you'd like to challenge.|<end>

19.「うむっ。それでは <%sM_ELEMENT>を| <%nM_NUM>こで よい: Mhm. Then <%dM_NUM> <%sM_ELEMENT> is|what you would like?|<yesno><close>

20.「では 受け取るがよい。| おぬしの さらなる飛躍に役立てることを| 祈っておる: Here, take it. I pray that they will be useful|in furthering your growth.|<end>

21.「達人クエストに 挑戦するのじゃな。| では 今週のお題は これじゃ！|<end: Challenge the Master Quest, hm? Here is this|week's theme!|<end>

22.「それは おぬしが今 受注中のクエストじゃな。| もし 挑戦するクエストを 変え: You have already accepted that quest. If you'd|like to change the quest you want to|challenge, please accept that one.|<end>

23.「『達人クエスト』では| 週に一度 すべての冒険者に向けて| ５つのクエストを:
With "Master Quests", adventurers will be|presented with 5 quests each week.|
|You can choose only one, so choose which|suits you best. Also, you may complete it|with companions if you so wish.|
|After completing the quest, I will give you|jewels of the attribute of your choice. Come|on, give it a try!.|

24.「達人クエストに挑めるのは 週に一度きりじゃ。| <%nM_DAY>日後に 新た: You can only undertake a single Master Quest|per week. There will be a new quest in <%dM_DAY>|days. Please come back then.|<bw_break>

25.「では どのチカラの宝珠にするか| 選ぶがよい。|<select_se_off>: Then, which jewel element will you choose?|<select_se_off>|Fire Jewel|Water Jewel|Wind Jewel|Light Jewel|Dark Jewel|<select_end>|<break>

26.「……と 言いたいところじゃが| どうぐかばんがいっぱいで 報酬が渡せぬな。|: ...is what I want to say, but your bag is full|so I can't reward you. <%dM_NUM> empty slots are|needed, so please come back again.|<bw_break>

27.「この宝珠を 鑑定するのじゃな？|<yesno><break>: This is the jewel you want to appraise?|<yesno><break>

28.「この石版を 鑑定するのじゃな？|<yesno><break>: YOU WILL NEVER SEE THIS PART 2

32.受けている達人クエストを キャンセルして|新しい 達人クエストを受けました。|<: You cancelled your current Master Quest and|accepted a new one.|<me 74><end>

33.「光の宝珠？じゃな。| では どちらにするか| 選ぶがよい。|<select_s: Light Jewel, hm? Which type would you like?|<select_se_off>|Skill Jewel|Special Move Jewel|<select_end>|<break>

34.「<pc>よ 来たか。| 順調に 修練を重ねているようじゃの。| そんなおぬしに: wow, that sure is a whole lot of text you will NEVER SEE

36.「今 所持している 未鑑定の物を| まとめて鑑定するが よいか？|<yesno>: Would you like to me to appraise all of your|unappraised items at once?|<yesno><break>

37.「これは…！ <%sM_JEWEL_NAME>！| おぬしに 新たな能力が 開花: This is...! <%sM_JEWEL_NAME>!!|You've developed a new ability. The jewel|has also been converted into <%dM_HOUJU_P> Jewel Point.

38.「<%sM_JEWEL_NAME> じゃな。| おぬしは すでに 開花している能: <%sM_JEWEL_NAME>, I see.|You already know this ability. The jewel|has also been converted into <%dM_HOUJU_P> Jewel Point.
